faq-main-body-tag: We are here to answer any of your question and support you where ever you need it. If you don´t find the answer here, then do not hesitate to contact us at support@zoxxo.io
faq-title-1: Can I share data without having an account?
faq-body-1: Yes, you can just visist zoxxo.io and upload your data upto 2 GB and share it with your friends, family and others.
faq-title-2: How long is my data available if I upload without an account?
faq-body-2: Ihre Daten werden bis zu 24 Stunden hochgeladen. Danach löschen wir Ihre ATA, wenn Sie sie ohne Konto hochladen.
faq-title-3: How can I upload more than 2 GB?
faq-body-3: You can create a free account and storage upto 4 GB and transfer 2 GB at once. However if you want to transfer more then 2 GB, you can go for TORNADO Plan. Therefore you can use our calculator and calculate the total cost. Please visit zoxxo.io/tornado for this purpose.
faq-title-4: What is included in FREE Plan?
faq-body-4: You can create a free account and storage upto 4 GB and transfer 2 GB at once. However if you want to transfer more then 2 GB, you can go for TORNADO Plan. Therefore you can use our calculator and calculate the total cost. Please visit zoxxo.io/tornado for this purpose.
faq-title-5: How do I manage my account?
faq-body-5: After login you will be redirected to the zoxxo BOX and there you can manage your account.
faq-body-6: You can use your Mastercard, VISA card and also PayPal to pay for the TORNADO Plan.
faq-title-7: How do I cancel my Plan?
faq-body-7: You can downgrade from TORNADO Plan by going to zoxxo BOX and clicking on Plan & Billing Page. You will find here the downgrade option, if you are subscribed to the TORNADO Plan.
